description.paragraph: Activate to have Finishing Move text appear when you send an action or attack to chat

on-apply-or-roll.name: When to show damage numbers
on-apply-or-roll.hint: [NOTE] If you set on apply, this module will both reveal the resistance/weakness amt as players see the final number, and will only let you see 1 number for your damage roll

font-size.name: Font Size
font-size.hint: Default size of the damage font

max-font-scale.name: Maximum Font Scale
max-font-scale.hint: Maximum Size to scale the damage font to

top-offset.name: % offset from top of token
top-offset.hint: Offset percentage from top of token for the damage, input as whole number (IE. 70 is 70%)

jitter.name: Jitter
jitter.hint: How much the damage text will move around its spawn point (0 = doesn't move, 1 is it could spawn on the edges of the token)

number-scale-type.name: Number Scale Type
number-scale-type.hint: Scaling type for the size of the damage RPG Numbers

damage-split.name: Damage Split
damage-split.hint: How to split damage numbers from roll (None: total only, By Type: By damage type, All: Splits all terms)

duration.name: Text Duration
duration.hint: How long until  the damage text despawns in seconds

wait-time-between-numbers.name: Wait Time between numbers (ms)
wait-time-between-numbers.hint: How long in between each damage number should the game wait before spawning the next, in milliseconds.

show-only-GM.name: Show numbers only for GM
show-only-GM.hint: Show  the damage numbers only for the game if you like them, but not that much

animation-scale.name: Animation Scale
animation-scale.hint: How far out from the token should  the damage numbers move

show-total.name: Show Total
show-total.hint: Show total as a number in the center of the token in addition to other damage numbers

enabled.name: Enable RPG Checks & Attacks
enabled.hint: Show number pop ups when attempting checks & attacks

duration.name: Check Duration
duration.hint: Time for check number pop up to show

outcome-result.name: Choose what to show for d20 check rolls
outcome-result.hint: Numbers shows the d20 + mods result, outcome shows crit success, success etc., and outcome w/o combat crits shows the outcome without combat critical misses and hits meant as compatibility with pf2e animations.

color-scheme.name: Select check theme
color-scheme.hint: (Changes coloration of checks) Currently have a default theme, and a dark mode theme, will add more visibility etc. for it later

enabled.name: Check SFX
enabled.hint: Select whether to play sfx on check results

check-or-attack.name: Check SFX for Attack Rolls
check-or-attack.hint: Select whether to play sfx for Attack Rolls, checks only, or both

options.name: Check SFX Option
options.hint: Select what SFX to play and when. (none - no sfx, Success or Fail - Play success sound effect on any success and fail sfx on any fail, Crits Only - Play on critical Success or Fail only,

criticalSuccess.name: Check SFX: Crit. Success
criticalSuccess.hint: Select SFX (not this does nothing on the 'Success or Failure' Setting)

success.name: Check SFX: Success
success.hint: Select SFX (used as Success in the 'Success or Failure' Setting)

failure.name: Check SFX: Failure
failure.hint: Select SFX (used as Failure in the 'Success or Failure' Setting)

criticalFailure.name: Check SFX: Crit. Failure
criticalFailure.hint: Select SFX (not this does nothing on the 'Success or Failure' Setting)

enabled.name: Enable Shake on Attack
enabled.hint: Shakes the screen when you attack, shakes more when you crit

type.name: Shake on Attack Enabled for?
type.hint: Choose who shake on attack is enabled for

enabled.name: Enable Damage Shake
enabled.hint: Shakes the screen when you apply damage using pf2e's apply damage button

duration.name: Duration
duration.hint: How long in to shake the screen in MS

intensity-max.name: Intensity
intensity-max.hint: How hard to shake the screen in pixels (recommended between 10 and 35)

intensity-type.name: Intensity Scaling
intensity-type.hint: How should screen shake intensity scale. None - just uses max value, % Current HP - scales off current HP, % Max HP - Scales off Max HP

intensity-include-temp-hp.name: Should scaling include Temp HP
intensity-include-temp-hp.hint: If you picked an intensity that scales off hp, toggling this on causes it to include temp hp

gm-enabled.name: Enable shaking for GM
gm-enabled.hint: Causes GM to experience screen shake for any actors and their tokens that don't have a player owner

enabled.name: Enable Token shaking on damage
enabled.hint: When you apply damage to a token cause it to shake

distance.name: Token shaking distance
distance.hint: Distance as % of width of Token

duration.name: Duration of Shake
duration.hint: Amt of time (ms) that token shakes

only-temp-hp-disable-shake.name: Temporary HP Absorbs Shakes?
only-temp-hp-disable-shake.hint: Toggle this on if you want the token not to shake if all the damage dealt is only to temporary HP

type.name: Token Shaking Scaling
type.hint: What to scale the shaking off of

distance.name: Scale distance of shakes
distance.hint: Scales the distance of the shakes (no = no scaling, max = treat setting for this as maximum, mid = treat setting for this as the middle value)

shakes.name: Scale number of shakes
shakes.hint: Scale how many times they shake (no = no scaling, max = treat setting for this as maximum, mid = treat setting for this as the middle value)

duration.name: Scale duration
duration.hint: Scale duration of shakes (no = no scaling, max = treat setting for this as maximum, mid = treat setting for this as the middle value)

enabled.name: Enable Token rotating on attacking
enabled.hint: When you attack the token turns towards who it attacks, then turns back to its original rotation. You can set the rotation offset to determine where the token faces.

duration.name: Token Rotation Duration
duration.hint: How long it takes the token to turn towards the enemy in seconds (Default is 0.5 s, overall time to turn and turn back is 1.5 x the time here)

scale-on-size.name: Enable Token Rotation Duration Size Scaling
scale-on-size.hint: Allow Rotation to take longer based on the size of the attacker (scales on the number of squares it takes up)

enabled.name: Enable Critical Animations
enabled.hint: Enable cool animations to show for critical hits. (note tokens have options to have alternative image)

player-enabled.name: Enable Critical Animations - For You
player-enabled.hint: Enable cool animations to show for critical hits for yourself. (note tokens have options to have alternative image)

sound.name: Critical Animation Sound
sound.hint: Sound to use for critical animation

volume.name: Critical Animation Volume
volume.hint: % of sound volume for critical animation

duration.name: Critical Animation Duration
duration.hint: Duration of the sound and effect

show-on.name: Show Critical Animation On
show-on.hint: Choose whether to show critical animation on attacks, checks, or both

show-on-token-type.name: Show Critical Animation For
show-on-token-type.hint: Choose to show critical animations for PCs, NPCS, or Both

default-img.name: Default Image
default-img.hint: Choose which to have the default image

delay.name: Delay
delay.hint: How long to delay when the critical animation shows up in seconds

enabled.name: Enable Finishing Moves
enabled.hint: When you use an action and have the HUD Element toggled on it gives you a cool readout of the action.

enabled-players.name: Enable Finishing Moves Option for Players
enabled-players.hint: Allow players to use finishing move feature (Reloads Foundry)

keep-on.name: Keep Finishing Moves On
keep-on.hint: No longer turns off finishing move after you make a finishing move effect

use-player-color.name: Use Player Color
use-player-color.hint: Use Player Color for finishing move surrounding glow

quality.name: Text Quality
quality.hint: Set Quality of Finishing Move text (1 - lowest, 5 - highest)

pcs.name: Show for PCs
pcs.hint: Show finishing move visual for PCs

npcs.name: Show for NPCs
npcs.hint: Show finishing move visual for NPCs

actions.name: On Any type of Action
actions.hint: Show on any type of actions (AKa not spells or attacks)

ranked.name: On Ranked Spells
ranked.hint: Show on spells that take up spell slots

end.name: End Duration
end.hint: Duration to show all text on screen at the end in ms

word.name: Word Duration
word.hint: How long to Wait before showing next word in ms

sound-effect.name: Finishing Move SFX
sound-effect.hint: Sound Effect to play for each Word that appears

volume.name: Finishing Move SFX Volume
volume.hint: Sound Effect Volume to play for each Word that appears

enabled.name: Show on End of Encounter?
enabled.hint: Show 'Enemy Felled' or whatever text you've added at end of encounter

type.name: Type of Effect
type.hint: Choose type of the effect to play

xp-threshold.name: End of Encounter XP Threshold
xp-threshold.hint: XP Threshold of the encounter to have the End of Encounter text to show (set to 0 to always show). [Trivial: <= 40, Low: 60, Moderate: 80, Severe: 120, Extreme: 160]

sound-effect.name: Noun Verbed SFX
sound-effect.hint: Sound effect to play for 'Noun Verbed'

volume.name: Noun Verbed SFX Volume
volume.hint: Volume to play sound effect for 'Noun Verbed'

duration.name: Noun Verbed Duration
duration.hint: How long to display the pop up in seconds

text.name: Noun Verbed Text
text.hint: Text to display for Noun Verbed

enabled.name: Show when owned character Dies
enabled.hint: Show this message to a PC when their character assigned to their user died.

type.name: Type of Effect
type.hint: Choose type of the effect to play

sound-effect.name: You Died SFX
sound-effect.hint: Sound effect to play for 'You Died'

volume.name: You Died SFX Volume
volume.hint: Volume to play sound effect for 'You Died'

duration.name: You Died Duration
duration.hint: How long to display the pop up in seconds

enabled.name: Enabled Every +1 Matters Features
enabled.hint: Adds features related to modifiers matters. Requires modifiers matters to be installed, as well as PF2e Animations IIRC.

debug-mode.name: Debug Mode
debug-mode.hint: Have the console receive messages for different stuff

notification.failure: PF2e RPG Settings failed to import :(

rotation-offset.name: Turn On Attack - Rotation Offset
rotation-offset.hint: Sets how much to offset the turn on attack rotation by. Down ⬇ 0, Right ➡ 90, Up ⬆ 180, Left ⬅ 270

fire-emblem-img.name: Fire Emblem Critical Pic
fire-emblem-img.hint: Image to show for critical hits for token when 'Fire Emblem' is selected

persona-img.name: Persona Critical Pic
persona-img.hint: Image to show for critical hits for token when 'Persona' is selected

offset-x.name: Crit X Offset
offset-x.hint: This is as a %, so 100, would move it to the right one full image length

offset-y.name: Crit Y Offset
offset-y.hint: This is as a %, so 100, would move it down one full image length

scale.name: Crit Scale
scale.hint: Size of critical hit image to scale in %

rotation.name: Crit Rotation
rotation.hint: How much to rotate the critical hit effect

sfx.name: Crit SFX
sfx.hint: Set this to override the default crit sound with custom one.

activate-finishing-move.name: Activate Finishing Move
activate-finishing-move.hint: Activates finishing move if you have it enabled
